channel.title: quantum mechanics on WILT
channel.description: Recent content in quantum mechanics on WILT

item.title: The magical mystery world of nuclear reactions exposed.
item.description: Nuclear wave function in function of for the proton state, obtained by diagonalizing the self energy in the exact continuum used above. The first eigenvalue at -23.97 MeV (solid red line) is compared by the corresponding harmonic oscillator state multiplied by the square root of the spectroscopic factor (dashed red line), the second eigenvalue at -2.85 MeV (solid blue line) is similarly compared with harmonic oscillator state (dashed blue line).

item.title: Calculation for Gaussian Matrix Elements
item.description: Detailed calculation of two-body matrix elements for a cooper pair (coupled to J=0, T=0), following the previous post but for the case of a Gaussian interaction between the members of the Cooper pair. Gaussian

item.title: Example of Calculation
item.description: Example of careful two-body contact interaction calculation, for Cooper pairs. Two body contact skyrme analytical calculation

item.title: Sterile neutrinos give birth to new Physics
item.description: Today I learned something more about sterile neutrinos, and the latest advancement to the quest of finding them.
